title: Bacon Pea Salad
directions: Stir together all of the ingredients and serve immediately, or (preferably) put in a tupperware, Gladware, or other tightly covered container in the refrigerator to give the flavours a chance to meld for an hour but up to three days prior to serving. Give it a gentle stir from top to bottom before serving.
ingredients: 1 pound of bacon cooked according to package instructions, drained and crumbled or finely chopped
2 pounds frozen peas thawed in the refrigerator overnight
3/4 cup coarsely grated sharp Cheddar cheese
1/2 small red onion peeled, and finely chopped
